author: Devan Cole, CNN
title: Rand Paul says he has successfully recovered from coronavirus
description: Republican Sen. Rand Paul of Kentucky announced Tuesday that he has successfully recovered from his bout with the novel coronavirus and is now volunteering at a hospital to help patients stricken with Covid-19.
content:
Washington (CNN)Republican Sen. Rand Paul of Kentucky announced Tuesday that he has successfully recovered from his bout with the novel coronavirus and is now volunteering at a hospital to help patients stricken with Covid-19.
